name: Neverlooted Dungeon - Halloween Special
description:
Neverlooted Dungeon is an innovative first-person dungeon crawler immersive sim, with a unique gameplay focus on treacherous deadly traps, physics-based challenges, rewarding exploration, and tremendous freedom of action, inspired by classics like Ultima Underworld, Arx Fatalis, and D&D.

Halloween Special

This is the Halloween Special demo of the game Neverlooted Dungeon, with an Halloween theme and new unique features. Be part of the deadliest candy hunt ever! 

Features

Find Your Own Ways Through an Immersive World

Find your own ways to overcome dangers and challenges in a deeply immersive world with tremendous freedom of action, where your creativity is rewarded. Stack tables on spikes, block saws with chopped arms, throw pumpkins at levers, or burn the dungeon to the ground - it’s up to you.

Rewarding Exploration of Non-Linear Levels

Explore a great variety of non-linear levels overflowing with forgotten secrets in every corner, hidden relics behind banners, piles of treasure under beds, countless traps, and lurking monsters.

Defeat Hidden Treacherous Traps

Live out an intense adventure with a unique focus on defeating treacherous, deadly traps. Be careful, pay attention to the details, sharpen your senses, watch your steps, don't touch anything, become paranoid.

Join the Community

Join the DISCORD to join the community and chat directly with us. Follow me on TWITTER to get the latest news.
